sentences.en: a scruffy old pair of jeans
sentences.cn: 一条不干净的旧牛仔裤

sentences.en: Despite her scruffy clothes, there was an air of sophistication about her.
sentences.cn: 尽管她衣衫褴褛, 但神态老练世故.

sentences.en: He now regards these scruffy photographs as his shield and buckler.
sentences.cn: 他现在把这些一文不值的照片当成他的护身符和挡箭牌.

sentences.en: His scruffy appearance does not reflect his character.
sentences.cn: 他邋遢的外表并不反映他的性格.

sentences.en: It is not proper to wear a scruffy jeans in a dinner party.
sentences.cn: 穿着破旧的牛仔裤在宴会上显得不太得体.

sentences.en: It was a big bird, old and bold and scruffy, utterly without fear.
sentences.cn: 这是只大鸟, 又老又脏又大胆, 毫无惧意.

sentences.en: Now a rash of scruffy little shops bordered one side of the street.
sentences.cn: 现在街道的一边排满了各种破旧的小店。

sentences.en: The porter put our scruffy rain-sodden luggage on a trolley.
sentences.cn: 搬运工把我们那些被雨水浸透的脏兮兮的行李放上了手推车。

sentences.en: The scruffy boy a cheeky grin is staring at me.
sentences.cn: 那个满脸坏笑的邋遢小男孩一直盯着我看.

sentences.en: The town is scruffy and unappealing.
sentences.cn: 那个城镇脏乱不堪，令人生厌。

sentences.en: They are scruffy, hardened , fierce, and more than a little bit insane.
sentences.cn: 他们衣衫褴褛 、 性格刚毅 、 脾气暴躁且多少有点神经质.

sentences.en: Uncle Sam is portrayed as scruffy, mean and bitter.
sentences.cn: 山姆大叔的形象被画得衣着邋遢 、 吝啬且心胸狭窄.

sentences.en: You can't go to a job interview looking so scruffy!
sentences.cn: 你求职去面试不能这邋里邋遢的!
